title: Eden Hazard gives away shirt to Brighton fan who made a homemade sign
description: A Brighton fan received Eden Hazard's shirt at full-time when the Belgian spotted the youngster's homemade sign after the 4-0 win.
content: An inspired performance from Hazard helped Chelsea back to winning ways in the Premier League with a comprehensive victory against Brighton at the Amex Stadium.The Belgian celebrated the victory by heading over to a young fan in the home section who had made homemade sign pleading for his jersey.The youngster has scribed the message "Hazard - can I please have your shirt" - and Hazard must have spotted him during the game.Hit the video to watch the heartwarming moment.
